snippet: Mr. Keith represented Leslie Van Houten, one of three women on trial with Charles Manson, after her previous attorney vanished.
abstract: Maxwell S Keith, lawyer who defended two members of the so-called Manson family in their notorious cult murder trials, dies at age 87.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Keith represented Leslie Van Houten, one of three women on trial with Charles Manson, after her previous attorney vanished.

headline.seo: Maxwell S. Keith, Lawyer in Manson Case, Dies at 87
headline.main: Maxwell S. Keith Dies at 87; Replacement Lawyer in Manson Case
headline.print_headline: Maxwell S. Keith, 87, Replacement Lawyer in Manson Case
